title: Dinuk | Portfolio
about-paragraph: Enthusiastic undergraduate Software Engineer with a strong foundation in programming languages such as Python, Java, and full-stack web development. With hands-on experience through projects, I am proficient in both back-end and front-end technologies, cloud services and have a commitment to delivering scalable and efficient software solutions. Dedicated to applying analytical skills and creativity to contribute effectively to software development teams.
skills-paragraph: Expertise in designing and developing full-stack web applications.
skill0-paragraph: I have experience with HTML5, CSS3, and responsive web design. I have built websites using semantic HTML5 tags, and I have a good understanding of the various features of HTML5.
skill1-paragraph: I have experience with CSS3, including preprocessors like Sass and Less. I have built responsive websites using media queries, and I have a good understanding of the various features of CSS3.
skill2-paragraph: I have experience with JavaScript, including ES6 syntax and modern JavaScript frameworks like React and Angular. I have built interactive web applications using JavaScript, and I have a good understanding of the various features of JavaScript.
skill3-paragraph: I have experience with React, including React Hooks and React Context. I have built interactive web applications using React, and I have a good understanding of the various features of React.
skill4-paragraph: I have experience with Python, including data structures, algorithms, and object-oriented programming. I have built scripts and applications using Python, and I have a good understanding of the various features of Python.
projects-paragraph: Exploring creativity and functionality through my featured development projects.
contact-paragraph: I'm excited to collaborate and turn your ideas into reality
